dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will break down complex problems into smaller, manageable parts and analyze them systematically.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and experience to identify patterns and find creative solutions.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin learn new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through visual aids, such as diagrams and videos.
Your FarTwin will learn best through auditory input, such as lectures and discussions.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin work with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively participate in team projects and value the input of others.
Your FarTwin will strive to be the best individual contributor and may come across as overly competitive.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin will carefully weigh the pros and cons before taking a risk and prefer to avoid uncertainty.
Your FarTwin will actively seek out new challenges and take calculated risks to achieve their goals.

dimensions.label: Analytical Thinking
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin analyze data?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on the details and ensure accuracy in their analysis.
Your FarTwin will take a step back and consider the overall strategy and long-term implications of data analysis.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will freely express their emotions and be transparent about their feelings.
Your FarTwin will keep their emotions to themselves and maintain a professional demeanor.

dimensions.label: Global Perspective
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach global issues?

options.description: Your FarTwin will consider the interconnectedness of global problems and strive for a comprehensive solution.
Your FarTwin will focus on local issues and may not fully appreciate the broader implications of their actions.

dimensions.label: Professional Development
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach their career?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be driven to succeed and pursue opportunities for advancement.
Your FarTwin will prioritize stability and security over rapid career progress.
